ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql: select `main`.`顧客ID` AS `顧客ID`,`main`.`グループID` AS `グループID`,`main`.`申込タイプID` AS `申込タイプID`,(case when (`sub`.`special_note` is not null) then `sub`.`special_note` else `main`.`特記事項` end) AS `特記事項`,(case when (`sub`.`default_set_flg` is not null) then `sub`.`default_set_flg` else `main`.`初期セットフラグ` end) AS `初期セットフラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`private_flg` is not null) then `sub`.`private_flg` else `main`.`非公開フラグ` end) AS `非公開フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`active_flg` is not null) then `sub`.`active_flg` else 1 end) AS `有効フラグ` from ((select `main`.`customer_id` AS `顧客ID`,`main`.`group_id` AS `グループID`,`sub`.`order_type_id` AS `申込タイプID`,`sub`.`default_set_flg` AS `初期セットフラグ`,`sub`.`private_flg` AS `非公開フラグ`,(case when (`sub`.`special_note` is not null) then `sub`.`special_note` else `sub2`.`special_note` end) AS `特記事項` from ((`m_customer_group` `main` join `m_group_order_type` `sub` on((`main`.`group_id` = `sub`.`group_id`))) join `m_order_type` `sub2` on((`sub`.`order_type_id` = `sub2`.`order_type_id`)))) `main` left join `m_customer_order_type` `sub` on(((`main`.`顧客ID` = `sub`.`customer_id`) and (`main`.`グループID` = `sub`.`group_id`) and (`main`.`申込タイプID` = `sub`.`order_type_id`)))) order by `main`.`顧客ID`,`main`.`グループID`,`main`.`申込タイプID`
